content.body: How come the readme doesn't show any actual example of using `AsyncContext` with async/await?
content.formatted_body: How come the readme doesn't show any actual example of using AsyncContext with async/await?

content.body: There are a bunch of examples, using `setTimeout`, `p.then()`, and `await`
